name: Powered Kid Loses Control at Dinner

masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote:
"My daughter's powers just manifestedâ€”AT CHRISTMAS DINNER! She's floating, things are on fire, the turkey exploded! She's terrified and so is everyone else! We need someone who understands what she's going through, not just cops! Please, she's only thirteen!"

Requirements

  • Calm the new metahuman before she hurts herself or others
  • Contain the manifestation effects safely
  • Help the family understand what's happening to their daughter
